name: Repealed
text:
§701-119  REPEALED.  L 1988, c 260, §§4, 7; L 1996, c 104, §6.
 
Cross References
 
  Forfeiture of property used as benefit or pecuniary benefit in the commission of an offense, see §710-1001.
  Forfeiture of property used in illegal gambling, see §712-1230.
  Hawaii omnibus criminal forfeiture act, see chapter 712A.
